disclaimerData.disclaimer:
Treatment Objective
This procedure involves the injection of dermal fillers to augment the volume and contour of the buttocks for aesthetic enhancement.

Potential Risks and Adverse Events
I acknowledge that all medical and cosmetic interventions carry inherent risks. Specific to this buttock enhancement treatment, possible complications may include, but are not limited to:

- Discomfort, inflammation, or hematoma (bruising)
- Lack of symmetry between sides
- Bacterial or other infection
- Hypersensitivity or allergic responses
- Formation of palpable bumps or nodules beneath the skin
- Development of an abscess
- Alterations in skin color or surface texture
- The potential necessity for further corrective treatments
- Rare yet severe incidents such as blood vessel blockage (vascular occlusion), tissue death (necrosis), vision loss, or stroke

No assurances can be given concerning the final results, as individual responses differ and medical practice involves inherent variability.

I have been given the chance to inquire about the procedure, other available options, associated risks, and possible complications. All of my questions have been answered fully and to my satisfaction.

I verify that I am not pregnant, attempting to conceive, or currently nursing a child.

I have been provided with and thoroughly understand information regarding:
- My personal objectives and anticipated outcomes
- The risks involved in undergoing the procedure and in choosing not to proceed
- Any risks particular to my health profile
- The expected benefits and possible disadvantages
- Alternative choices (including opting for no treatment)
- The probability of success and any related uncertainties
- Any potential follow-up care that may be required

Medical Photography and Recording
I give permission for clinical photographs and videos to be taken. I understand these will be stored as part of my confidential medical history.

I have discussed my desired results in detail and have received all necessary information to make an informed choice.

I confirm that I have read and comprehend this consent document, have had sufficient opportunity for discussion, and that no new information has arisen to change my decision. I provide my consent to this procedure freely. This document represents the complete disclosure and overrides any prior verbal or written communications.

questions.content: Do you comprehend the details that have been given to you?
Do you believe enough information has been shared to allow you to give informed consent?
Have you given your consent voluntarily?
Are there any health issues you currently have?
Are you currently pregnant or nursing a child?
Do you suffer from a neuromuscular disorder (such as Multiple Sclerosis, ALS, motor neuropathy, myasthenia gravis, or Lambert-Eaton syndrome)?
Do you have an autoimmune condition?
Do you experience any skin problems?
Do you have any known allergies or a history of severe allergic reactions (anaphylaxis)?
Is there an active infection at the area where the treatment is planned?
Are you currently on any antibiotics or other prescribed medications?
Is there any other Medical or Social History we should be aware of? If yes, please explain in detail.
What are your goals and desired results for undergoing this procedure? Please elaborate.
Have you undergone this or a comparable treatment previously? If so, were there any issues? Please provide details.
Do you have any concerns? If so, please describe them.
Is there anything else we need to know? Please provide full information.
I will keep this information for the duration of my treatment and consult it as needed.
